NewText_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Think_01>Lady Riju is currently training—she is
trying to become strong enough to save
us from this disaster.
NewText_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0300>However, the attire you are wearing is...<sp:5:0:0>
not acceptable. Please put on a bit more
before coming into town.
NewText_00: <sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Angry_00><sp:0:2:2:7d00>Voe are not permitted to be here!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
NewText_03:
It's all right.


This one has the chief's permission to
enter, and he is welcome to visit any of
the shops and businesses.
Spread the word. Let everyone know this
is the case.
NewText_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_00>For you to come all this way, enduring the
strange storm that plagues us... <sp:5:0:0>You must
have some important news to share.
NewText_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0300>If you are hoping to speak with Lady Riju,
you should visit the <clr:0000>ruins to the north<clr:ffff>.
NewText_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:QuestionNormal_01>The princess of Hyrule is still missing?!


We had heard of the events at Hyrule
Castle, but this...<sp:5:0:0> Things are dire, indeed.
NewText_12: <snd:Angry_01>A thief! There's a thief! Capture him!
NewText_06:
Still, Swordsman... I mean, Link.<sp:5:0:0> I am
impressed you made it here through
the storm that surrounds Gerudo Town.
NewText_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Trouble_01>The sand shroud settled on us some time
ago. We sent out patrols to try to
determine what was causing it, but...
A swarm of monsters—creatures called
Gibdos—suddenly appeared, attacked our
troops, and forced us to retreat.
The Gibdos have even made their way into
the town. As a result, everyone was
evacuated to this shelter for their safety.
As someone charged with protecting
Gerudo Town, I am ashamed at our
current situation.
NewText_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0300>This is all to say that, although I wish I
could help you search for the princess,
now is...<sp:5:0:0>not a good time. I'm sorry.
NewText_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0300>However, the attire you are wearing is...<sp:5:0:0>
not acceptable.

I would ask that you not dress like those
who have historically attacked us.<sp:5:0:0> If you
want to enter town, change your attire.
